When a message subject (or severals) is dragged to the desktop (or another folder), nothing happens in Thunderbird 3 on Mac OS X 10.6.6 (Tried several times in the past on differents Mac OS / Thunderbird versions and got the same result). 
It works on the Windows version of TB 3.

I'm sure a lot of mac users worldwild are missing this !

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. drag a message subject from Thunderbird to the desktop or elsewhere
Actual Results:  
nothing happens = no creation of eml file like on the Windows version

Expected Results:  
eml file
